azureLogAnalytics.query:
AppExceptions
| extend splitted=split(AppRoleInstance, ':')
| extend splitted, Environment = tostring(splitted[0]), Region = tostring(splitted[1]), Stamp = tostring(splitted[2]), Instance = tostring(splitted[3])
| where "$Environment:csv" has Environment and "$Region:csv" has Region and "$Stamp:csv" has Stamp and "$Instance:csv" has Instance
| summarize Count=count() by bin(TimeGenerated,1m), Environment, Region, Stamp, Instance, AppRoleName
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, Environment, Region, Stamp, Instance, AppRoleName, Count

AppExceptions
| extend splitted=split(AppRoleInstance, ':')
| extend splitted, Environment = tostring(splitted[0]), Region = tostring(splitted[1]), Stamp = tostring(splitted[2]), Instance = tostring(splitted[3])
| where "$Environment:csv" has Environment and "$Region:csv" has Region and "$Stamp:csv" has Stamp and "$Instance:csv" has Instance
| summarize Count=count() by bin(TimeGenerated,1m), Environment, Region, Stamp, Instance, AppRoleName
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, Environment, Region, Stamp, Instance, AppRoleName, Count

AppExceptions
| extend splitted=split(AppRoleInstance, ':')
| extend splitted, Environment = tostring(splitted[0]), Region = tostring(splitted[1]), Stamp = tostring(splitted[2]), Instance = tostring(splitted[3])
| where "$Environment:csv" has Environment and "$Region:csv" has Region and "$Stamp:csv" has Stamp and "$Instance:csv" has Instance
| summarize Count=count() by bin(TimeGenerated,1m), Environment, Region, Stamp, Instance, AppRoleName
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, Environment, Region, Stamp, Instance, AppRoleName, Count

AppExceptions
| extend splitted=split(AppRoleInstance, ':')
| extend splitted, Environment = tostring(splitted[0]), Region = tostring(splitted[1]), Stamp = tostring(splitted[2]), Instance = tostring(splitted[3])
| where "$Environment:csv" has Environment and "$RegionShortName:csv" has Region and "$Stamp:csv" has Stamp and "$CustomerInstance:csv" has Instance
| summarize Count=count() by bin(TimeGenerated,1m), AppRoleName
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, AppRoleName, Count

AppExceptions
| extend splitted=split(AppRoleInstance, ':')
| extend splitted, Environment = tostring(splitted[0]), Region = tostring(splitted[1]), Stamp = tostring(splitted[2]), Instance = tostring(splitted[3])
| where "$Environment:csv" has Environment and "$RegionShortName:csv" has Region and "$Stamp:csv" has Stamp and "$CustomerInstance:csv" has Instance
| summarize Count=count() by AppRoleName
| order by Count desc, AppRoleName asc

AppExceptions
| extend splitted=split(AppRoleInstance, ':')
| extend splitted, Environment = tostring(splitted[0]), Region = tostring(splitted[1]), Stamp = tostring(splitted[2]), Instance = tostring(splitted[3])
| where "$Environment:csv" has Environment and "$RegionShortName:csv" has Region and "$Stamp:csv" has Stamp and "$CustomerInstance:csv" has Instance
| summarize Count=count() by bin(TimeGenerated,1m), Environment, Region, Stamp, Instance, AppRoleName
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, Environment, Region, Stamp, Instance, AppRoleName, Count

AppExceptions
| extend splitted=split(AppRoleInstance, ':')
| extend splitted, Environment = tostring(splitted[0]), Region = tostring(splitted[1]), Stamp = tostring(splitted[2]), Instance = tostring(splitted[3])
| where "$Environment:csv" has Environment and "$RegionShortName:csv" has Region and "$Stamp:csv" has Stamp and "$CustomerInstance:csv" has Instance
| summarize Count=count() by Environment, Region, Stamp, Instance, AppRoleName
| order by Count desc

AppExceptions
| extend splitted=split(AppRoleInstance, ':')
| extend splitted, Environment = tostring(splitted[0]), Region = tostring(splitted[1]), Stamp = tostring(splitted[2]), Instance = tostring(splitted[3])
| where "$Environment:csv" has Environment and "$RegionShortName:csv" has Region and "$Stamp:csv" has Stamp and "$CustomerInstance:csv" has Instance
| summarize Count=count() by bin(TimeGenerated,1m), Environment, Region, ExceptionType
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, Environment, Region, ExceptionType, Count

AppExceptions
| where ExceptionType contains "socket"
| extend splitted=split(AppRoleInstance, ':')
| extend splitted, Environment = tostring(splitted[0]), Region = tostring(splitted[1]), Stamp = tostring(splitted[2]), Instance = tostring(splitted[3])
| where "$Environment:csv" has Environment and "$RegionShortName:csv" has Region and "$Stamp:csv" has Stamp and "$CustomerInstance:csv" has Instance
| summarize Count=count() by bin(TimeGenerated,1m), Environment, Region, ExceptionType
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, Environment, Region, ExceptionType, Count

azureResourceGraph.query:
resources
| where type == 'microsoft.insights/components' and name == "$ApplicationInsightsInstance"
| project appInsightsName = name, subscriptionId
| join kind=inner (
    resourcecontainers
    | where type == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project subscriptionId, subscriptionName = name)
    on subscriptionId
        | where subscriptionName startswith "dev" or subscriptionName startswith "prd"
        | distinct subscriptionId, subscriptionName, appInsightsName
| project subscriptionId

resources
| where type == 'microsoft.insights/components' and name == "$ApplicationInsightsInstance"
| project appInsightsName = name, subscriptionId, location
| join kind=inner (
    resourcecontainers
    | where type == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project subscriptionId, subscriptionName = name)
    on subscriptionId
        | where subscriptionName startswith "dev" or subscriptionName startswith "prd"
        | distinct subscriptionId, subscriptionName, appInsightsName, location
| project location

resources
| where type == 'microsoft.insights/components' and name == "$ApplicationInsightsInstance"
| project appInsightsName = name, subscriptionId, aiResourceGroup = resourceGroup
| join kind=inner (
    resourcecontainers
    | where type == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project subscriptionId, subscriptionName = name)
    on subscriptionId
        | where subscriptionName startswith "dev" or subscriptionName startswith "prd"
        | distinct subscriptionId, subscriptionName, appInsightsName, aiResourceGroup
| project aiResourceGroup

azureLogAnalytics.query:
AppExceptions
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1d)
| extend splitted=split(AppRoleInstance, ':')
| extend Environment = tostring(splitted[0]), Region = tostring(splitted[1]), Stamp = tostring(splitted[2]), Instance = tostring(splitted[3]), Container = tostring(splitted[4]), Replica = tostring(splitted[5])
| where "Environment:csv" has Environment and "$RegionShortName:csv" has Region
| distinct Stamp
| project Stamp

AppExceptions
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1d)
| extend splitted=split(AppRoleInstance, ':')
| extend Environment = tostring(splitted[0]), Region = tostring(splitted[1]), Stamp = tostring(splitted[2]), Instance = tostring(splitted[3]), Container = tostring(splitted[4]), Replica = tostring(splitted[5])
| where "$Environment:csv" has Environment and "$RegionShortName:csv" has Region and "$Stamp:csv" has Stamp
| distinct Instance
| project Instance
